page.title: 19Adult's Leisure Hollington
page.content: Many adults travel outside our area to sports centres, clubs, cinema, theatre and dances; mostly within a few miles, which is easy with a car. We questioned them and found they would like more facilities around Hollington There are 5{local pubs}which have a good trade (pint of beer 84p). 2 of them have a pleasant garden and serve many meals and snacks. Some pubs run football and darts teams. {Hastings Golf Course}is at Beauport Park. It is a full sized course (18 holes), set in beautiful scenery, and is well used. There is a club house serving drinks and meals. Nearby are Beauport Riding Stables.{Beauport {Squash Club}attracts many people, this is a popular game. There are several playing fields (eg.Harrow Lane, and Crowhurst) where football and cricket matches are played.
